name: Rose Thorn Bud Retro (FigJam template)
description:
This is a retrospective template that includes:

  • Intro (Emoji check-in and icebreakers)
  • Rose Thorn Bud (RTB)
  • Idea Prioritization


Team retrospectives (retro, in short) allow us to reflect on what went well, what did not go well, and what we can improve on based on our recently completed sprint. Itâ€™s a time for us to learn from our successes and challenges with the objective of improving the way we work in future projects.


-------


I started this retro template because I couldn't find an existing template that worked for me. This was a huge success for my team, and everyone enjoyed it. Hope it will be useful to you and your team too! ğŸ˜†ğŸ’•ğŸ™ğŸ»
